about_the_game:
Welcome to Deathpuddle: Choose Violence?, a thrilling and darkly comedic graphic cinematic narrative choice-driven adventure novel that puts you in control of Deathpuddle, a tall, lean ex-convict currently incarcerated. Falsely accused of impersonating a prisoner on prison property and breaking into people’s hearts, Deathpuddle's life is a whirlwind of humor, action, and bizarre situations. Clad in his blue hero costume, Deathpuddle is an anti-hero with not-so-superhero-like powers and tendencies.

In this episodic journey, each episode brings unique challenges and colorful characters. Episode 0.5 has Deathpuddle on a mission just to get to his first job; Episode 1 escalates as he wreaks havoc in a fast-food restaurant. Episode 2, Prickster Rescue Protocol, kicks the stakes up further, sending Deathpuddle to save the kidnapped Governor Prickster, navigating kidnappings, ambushes, and wildly unpredictable showdowns. Subsequent episodes will have Deathpuddle facing off against all manner of formidable foes, each story more epic and absurd than the last.

Meet a cast of unforgettable characters, including the gruff halfway house manager Marcus 'Ciggy' Jones, the quirky bunkmates Stinky Steve and Beans, the stern but severe Warden, the Judge, Correctional Officer Ceyo, the hot detective Veronica Chase, and frequent guest appearances of the local SWAT team. Engage in darkly humorous dialogues, make pivotal choices, and experience multiple outcomes based on your decisions. The game features video segments with impressive graphics and animations, enhancing the storytelling experience. Players can choose to enjoy the story through audio, text, or both, similar to an audiobook or visual novel.

Will you help him find redemption, or is his journey destined to loop back to his prison cell? Your choices shape the path—but be warned: every decision brings unexpected (and hilarious) consequences.

Disclaimer:

Deathpuddle is a “budget-value” blue anti-super-hero, and, obviously, a blue hero could never infringe on the rights of a certain red one. Seriously, don’t try this at home (or in prison). Enjoy the game. Like Jesus said, love God with all your heart, and love others as yourself. Now, buckle up—Deathpuddle’s problems are about to become everyone’s problem real quick in Deathpuddle: Choose Violence?

content_descriptors.notes: The content in this game is not appropriate for children.

name: Deathpuddle: Choose Violence?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-4300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 360
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
  • VR Support: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
  • VR Support: None

short_description: Enter the chaotic, not-so-superhero world of Deathpuddle: Choose Violence? Guide Deathpuddle through epic and absurd missions filled with dark humor, bizarre characters, and unpredictable outcomes. Can you help Deathpuddle survive and clear his name, or will he always end up back in jail?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
